EmailTemplate.name: Accelerator Blast Nov 7th, 2013.inviteblast
EmailTemplate.subject: Solutions Day is now…Tricentis Accelerate 2013 – DRIVING BUSINESS INNOVATION
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DearTricentis Clients and Partners,
With over 200 attendees, Accelerator 2013 is one of the largest functional testing events in Europe and features keynotes and session tracks from experts across all regions and industries . Choose your own schedule from more than 20 presentations covering topics such as Mobile, Agile, Test management, Next Gen test Automation and Risk Based Testing.
A full reception will follow the day's proceedings - networking at its best.
To view the full agenda and learn more about the event, visit: accelerate.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/en/solutions-day?utm_source=Event&utm_medium=E-Mail&utm_campaign=Accelerate_2013>
I hope you are as excited about this event as I am and I look forward to meeting in person. If you have not registered, please register here <http://www.tricentis.com/en/events/solutions-day/registration?utm_source=Event&utm_medium=E-Mail&utm_campaign=Accelerate_2013>.
Best Regards,
Ajay Murthy Chief Marketing Officer Tricentis
© 2013 Tricentis. All Rights Reserved. Tricentis is a registered trademark of Tricentis.
